name: Amazing Rio Game Pigeon Skeet Shooting
name_original: Amazing Rio Game Pigeon Skeet Shooting
description:
Rio Game Pigeon Skeet Shooting - Funniest Skeet Shooting Game

Rio Game Pigeon Skeet Shooting delivers the most fun and challenging skeet shooting experience this summer. It's the Olympic season so it's time to party and practice your shooting skills with this game. We created a beautiful Rio environment with beautiful and challenging skeet moving around. Game has beautiful color and easy controls for the whole family. This target shooting game is a simple one-touch game where the goal is to shoot all the skeet just like at the olympic, but with more fun! The level of difficulty will increase the more you play. How long will you be able to last?

Features of Rio Game Pigeon Skeet Shooting
- 6 different skeets to shoot and destroy
- Some random bombs
- Easy one touch gameplay
- Easy to shoot skeet and hard one
- Beautiful Rio color theme
- Infinite level
- Beat your own score

Are you ready to be the best shooter? Download and play Rio Game Pigeon Skeet Shooting
